array.param: true: furthest object first, closest object last; false: unsorted

CF_ONLY_WATER 2 - CF_NEAREST_CONTACT 4 - CF_ONLY_STATIC 8 - CF_ONLY_DYNAMIC 16 - CF_FIRST_CONTACT 32 - CF_ALL_OBJECTS (Usable only with CF_FIRST_CONTACT and it will check one contact per object) Flags can be combined: 2 + 4 = 6 - CF_NEAREST_OBJECT + CF_ONLY_STATIC
